summary: Looking for a warmer Dragons Crown Dress Retexture?
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][center]This is a warmer retexture of [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11767/?]Dragons Crown Sorceress Outfit for UNP[/url]. 
It will overwrite and replace whatever Dragons Crown dress texture you currently have (DCSorcBody.dds).[/center]
[b]Requirements:[/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11767/?]Dragons Crown Sorceress Outfit for UNP[/url]  - by the talented [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/657472/?]Backsteppo[/url].

--------------------

[b]Install Instructions:[/b]
1) Use NMM (or)
2) Unzip and drop the "textures" folder into your Skyrim "data" folder.
3) I hope a few people enjoy it! ^^

[b]Uninstall Instructions:[/b]
1) Use NMM (or)
2) Delete/overwrite the dds file.

Happy adventuring!

- Larsepan

Credits:
Backsteppo


[center]UNPB & CBBE Curvy HDT conversions can be found at - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75616/?]Warmer Conversions - DC Sorceress[/url][/center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75616/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/jem5dci.png[/img][/url]
author: karupisu
